name: nestedContainer(keyedBy:forKey:)
desc: Stores a keyed encoding container for the given key and returns it.
declaration: mutating func nestedContainer<NestedKey>(keyedBy keyType: NestedKey.Type, forKey key: KeyedEncodingContainer<K>.Key) -> KeyedEncodingContainer<NestedKey> where NestedKey : CodingKey
